markdown.markdown: ![Benjamin Ma](https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/895125?s=400&v=4){width=80%} Contact Info {#contact} -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- - Ben26msh@gmail.com - [github.com/BenjaminMa](https://github.com/BenjaminMa26) - +1 2069307372 - For more information, please contact me via email. Skills {#skills} -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- - Experienced in statistical analysis, business mapping methods. - Experience with business analysis and market (inbound, outbound) research with CRM and Salesforce. - Skilled in leadership - Skilled in R, Stata, Excel, and SQL Disclaimer {#disclaimer} -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This resume was made with the R package [**pagedown**](https://github.com/rstudio/pagedown). Last updated on `r Sys.Date()`. Main ================================================================================ Benjamin Ma {#title} -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### Senior year UC SanDiego Student looking for a skill related job (Business Analyst or marketing related). Education {data-icon=graduation-cap data-concise=true} -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### University of California, San Diego B.S. Business Economics San Diego, USA 2022-2024 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### University of Edinburgh Study Abroad Edinburgh, UK 2023 Professional Experience {data-icon=suitcase} -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### Sales Development Representative, intern Camal Group. San Diego, USA 2023 ::: concise - Sourcing, cleaning, and visualizing trade data from prospect. - Generating weekly summary report to assist make sale strategy decisions. - Overfulfil the KPI and achieved multiple sales for company. - Received return offer from company. ::: Volunteer Experience {data-icon=chalkboard-teacher} -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### United Nations Volunteer Program (Goodness and Mercy Missions) Participated in non-profit organization Developed marketing strategies with team. Negotiated fundrasing with government agencies and global institutions. Awarded with a certification New York, USA 11/01/2020-08/01/2021 ### United Nations Volunteer Program (Cameroon Association of Active Youths) -Assisted facilitating donations from institutions -Led a safety equipment's advisory group. -Cleaning donation data -Using data visualization tools for weekly project evaluation. -Received a certification and letter of appreciation. New York, USA 11/25/2020-03/25/2021 Skills {data-icon=file} -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- CRM, Salesforce, Microsoft-office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint), SQL, STATA, R/Rstudio.
